summary: THE VEHICLE DISPLAYED NUMEROUS ELECTRICAL PROBLEMS.* MR  THE DOOR LOCK MALFUNCTIONED, THE WINDOWS WERE NOISY, THE SEAT MOVED BACK/FORTH WHILE DRIVING,THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS WERE INTERMITTENT WHILE IN USE, THE RADIO CLOCK BLINKED ON/OFF, THE FUEL GAUGE WAS INOPERATIVE, THE HEADLIGHTS WERE DIM, AND THE BATTERY LEAKED ACID.  THE FUSES AND MODULES REPLACED, AND WOULD ONLY WORK FOR A FEW MINUTES THEN QUIT.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A NEW VEHICLE.   SCC   *JB
